definition.de: Schriftliche Verträge, die sich auf eine bestimmte Gruppe von Beschäftigten beziehen.
definition.dk: Aftale mellem fagforeningsorganisation og arbejdsgiver om ansættelsesvilkår, herunder uenighed om dens fortolkning.
definition.en-GB: Negotiated guidelines for relationships between groups of employees and employers, including issues such as working hours, wages, health care, pensions and other benefits
definition.en-US: Negotiated guidelines for relationships between groups of employees and employers, including issues such as working hours, wages, health care, pensions and other benefits
definition.pt-BR: Contratos geralmente escritos que cobrem uma classe específica de trabalhadores.
definition.pt-PT: Contratos geralmente escritos que cobrem uma classe específica de trabalhadores.
definition.se: Överenskommelse mellan facklig organisation och arbetsgivare om anställningsvillkor.
definition.zh-Hans: 通常是涉及特定类别工人的书面合同
